#labels Featured
1. Please download the binary of the latest version from the Web site.
2. Please sign the sis file with [https://www.symbiansigned.com/app/page/public/openSignedOnline.do Open Signed Online].
   Please use and search for the Web site of Google about details of the signature method.

4. Please uninstall it absolutely if the previous version is installed in a mobile device.
5. Please install signed TTGPSLogger.sis in a mobile device.
